Description: If symbols are used, their meaning shall be described in the instructions for use.
"On" "Off" symbols, lightings symbols, start-up assistance symbols, audible warning device symbols design shall be in accordance with those described in Annex H and Annex I.
Comments: Specific symbol design requirements per Annex H and I
